channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- DellEMC System Update - DSU
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- DellEMC System Update - DSU

item.title: CVE-2021-21529|2024-08-03T18:16:23.124Z -- dell -- dellemc%20system%20update%20-%20dsu
item.description: Dell System Update (DSU) 1.9 and earlier versions contain a denial of service vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with low privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to run out of memory by running multiple instances of the vulnerable application.

item.title: CVE-2022-22554|2024-08-03T03:14:55.820Z -- dell -- dellemc%20system%20update%20-%20dsu
item.description: Dell EMC System Update, version 1.9.2 and prior, contain an Unprotected Storage of Credentials vulnerability. A local attacker with user privleges could potentially exploit this vulnerability leading to the disclosure of user passwords.
